actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Friday, May 26, 2023,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Friday, May 26, 2023, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today .

PN455:
        Darrel James Papillion, of Louisiana, to be United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Louisiana

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 31. Record Vote Number: 133
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Schumer, at  6:56 p.m., the Senate recessed, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
